name: The Stack v2
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A comprehensive dataset of over 3 billion source code files across 600+ programming languages, compiled from the Software Heritage archive as of September 2023.
size: Approximately 5.5 billion samples, totaling around 67.5 terabytes.
notes: Developed by the BigCode project in collaboration with Software Heritage, this dataset serves as a substantial resource for training and evaluating large language models for code generation and understanding. Access requires an agreement with Software Heritage and INRIA; contact datasets@softwareheritage.org for more information.
